e: ￹`Ihakowa~ `a~ `liyad~ `kiso~ `a~ `misa~`wad~ `a~ `mi~`tilid~?￺What class did you graduate with?￻你是那一屆的畢業生
d.f: ￹￺groups following each other in succession￻人羣一團跟著一團
￹￺vehicles follow each other in succession￻車子一部接著一部
￹￺sections of writings following one another * lessons * chapters￻文章一篇接一篇，著述第幾章第幾節

e: ￹`sa~`liya~`liyad~ `sa~`~￺again and again in succession￻一波又一波，連綿迭起，反反覆覆
d.f: ￹￺a single wave which is a part of a succession of waves heading toward shore￻沖擊岸邊的一陣波浪
